summary: Documentation for typedSearchAttributes is incomplete and lacks concrete examples for migrating from the deprecated searchAttributes API in WorkflowOptions.
userImpact: Users attempting to migrate from deprecated searchAttributes to typedSearchAttributes lack clear guidance and concrete examples in the documentation.
proposedFix: Add concrete examples and migration guidance for typedSearchAttributes to the TypeScript documentation at docs.temporal.io/develop/typescript/observability
keyQuote: Documentation still mentions only searchAttributes at https://docs.temporal.io/develop/typescript/observability without the concrete examples how to use typedSearchAttributes
